author: gsim
msg: Changes to threading: queues serialiser removed, io threads used to drive dispatch to consumers
Fix to PersistableMessage: use correct lock when accessing synclist, don't hold enqueue lock when notifying queues

author: amita
msg: TUSCANY-1923 first set of changes - tool and test cases

author: niq
msg: Since we don't support chained filters, and can't expect to while the
filter_init problem remains, we should make it clear to users at startup time.

author: andreas
msg: Improved error notification of lucene index transformer.
